name: KineticGlue
tag_list: business-social-network, enterprise-social-network, social-software, team-collaboration, enterprise-microblogging, group-collaboration
overview: KineticGlue Online Communities Pvt. Ltd. is a leader in enterprise social collaboration. Headquartered in Bangalore, it was founded by Vivek Paul, a globally recognized technology industry veteran. KineticGlue’s Web 2.0 platform enables smooth online collaboration for distributed teams, allowing them to manage people, documents and projects easily. Thousands of users across large and small enterprises around the world now use KineticGlue to work together in a smarter way.

offices.address1: #56, 3rd Floor, BMS Plaza,1st Block, 3rd Phase, BSK 3rd Stage, Bangalore 560085 India
